argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | blssp.2 | |- N = ( M |` ( S X. S ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_metxmet | |- ( M e. ( Met ` X ) -> M e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_ad2antrr | |- ( ( ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) /\ ( Y e. S /\ R e. RR+ ) ) -> M e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) /\ ( Y e. S /\ R e. RR+ ) ) -> Y e. S ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) /\ ( Y e. S /\ R e. RR+ ) ) -> S C_ X ) |
| 6 |  | #P_sseqin2 | |- ( S C_ X <-> ( X i^i S ) = S ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) /\ ( Y e. S /\ R e. RR+ ) ) -> ( X i^i S ) = S ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) /\ ( Y e. S /\ R e. RR+ ) ) -> Y e. ( X i^i S ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_rpxr | |- ( R e. RR+ -> R e. RR* ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ad2antll | |- ( ( ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) /\ ( Y e. S /\ R e. RR+ ) ) -> R e. RR* ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_blres | |- ( ( M e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ Y e. ( X i^i S ) /\ R e. RR* ) -> ( Y ( ball ` N ) R ) = ( ( Y ( ball ` M ) R ) i^i S ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 8, 10, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) /\ ( Y e. S /\ R e. RR+ ) ) -> ( Y ( ball ` N ) R ) = ( ( Y ( ball ` M ) R ) i^i S ) ) |
